title: Why is Thornmail useless
body: can someone pls explain to me when did thornmail become so useless, every game i had so far with thornmail always ends up with thier adc just shredding through it. Can someone just give me a reason why

replies.body: go{{champion:33}} {{item:3075}} {{item:3143}} ps only works on ramus
New adcs 2 OP. Pretty much the damage you do to them with {{item:3075}} they will heal + more when they crit you
You think they'll buff it for the season
probs not. they nerfed it for the season so adc ran supreme

I dunno, having a fed ADC only able to do 20 damage to you per hit, yet he's hitting himself for 250 damage, while you hit him for 170 damage with your AAs is pretty damn awesome I feel.

{{champion:33}}  Ok.

who cares how it feels, do the maths or let someone else do it and determine when its right to buy it, just like any other item. generally dont buy it unless you have at least randuins or dead mans as extra bonus armour for its effect. sunfire cape and thornmail are a bad combo of items

sunfire having the least amount of additional armour compared to randuins/dead mans means it gives less of the thornmail reflect damage. also together sunfire and thornmail are one of the least effective 2-item tank combo, mainly because both items utilise a damage output function with the thornmails damage reflection and the sunfires melee range passive

they're both a lot cheaper so for a 2 item tankiness "spike" you might think you're getting value in taking some damage as well as dealing it to enemies. the thing is, sunfires only works when you're in melee range, and thornmail only works WELL when you have more than 1 other armour item. if you're in melee range dealing barely 30-40 magic damage a second, and your only other tank item isnt useful at all yet, you will be absolutely destroyed by pretty much any other champ building any other items

TLDR dont buy it until you have dead mans, randuins and preferably another armour item
